description: ptree is a minimal implementation of PairTree, which is a filesystemconvention from the digital preservation community for mappingidentifiers to file system locations, and vice versa.See httpsconfluence.ucop.edudisplayCurationPairTree for more details.
longdescription: ptree is a minimal implementation of PairTree, which is a filesystemconvention from the digital preservation community for mappingidentifiers to file system locations, and vice versa.See httpsconfluence.ucop.edudisplayCurationPairTree for more details.
